metadata.title: CVE-2015-6938 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the file browser innotebook/notebookapp.py in IPython Notebook before 3.2.2 and JupyterNotebook 4.0.x before 4.0.5 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary webscript or HTML via a folder name.  NOTE: this was originally reported as across-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability, but this may beinaccurate.

criterions.comment: ipython: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
